subtitle: designed to incapacitate and enslave any
species they encountered the virus
targeted the very essence of Martian
Powers rendering them weak and feeble
unable to tap into their
abilities panic and despair gripped the
Martian populace as many fell ill and
were swiftly captured by the anak's
forces surprised by The Invasion Hanuman
used his Martian abilities to fight
against the tall anak Warrior humanoids
raing the center's archives ready to
sacrifice his life to protect the
records of ancient mulc he thought about
his wife and daughter and fled the
collapsing Capital he navigated through
invading anak flying drone enforcers
enslavement envoys demolished buildings
guard posts and the bodies of his fellow
martians near the outskirts of his home
tragically when he arrived home he found
his wife myia and daughter kahim had
fallen ill and passed away
